hackathon-description-text: You are all invited to R1 IEEE StuCon’s main Friday evening event, which is going to be a 6hour hackathon. Hackathons are events where many teams (of up to four students) from different backgrounds and levels of experience join together to build creative technical projects. Participants will demonstrate their projects to judges, with the chance to win Amazon Gift Cards if your team places 1st or 2nd. This is an opportunity to have your work featured on Devpost and to network with fellow IEEE members throughout the night.
hackathon-requirements: Please submit videos & pictures if possible!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $50 of Amazon Gift cards for each of the 4 teammates.
$25 of Amazon Gift cards for each of the 4 teammates.

hackathon-location-description: David G. Salten Hall - Room SC2
